title: Plasso
description: Plasso's brand colors, a harmonious blend of vibrant and calming shades, are widely recognized in the fintech industry. The primary blue (#6585ED) exudes trust and reliability, while the cheerful coral (#F5756C) adds a dynamic touch. Complemented by the muted teal (#98AFC0) and deep navy (#2F3148), these colors convey a blend of innovation and stability. These hues are visible across various digital platforms and marketing materials, consistently embodying Plasso's identity.
